title: any help with this one?
content:
Hi guys,

not sure what this one is - perhaps its customized, but any idea much appreciated...

Thanks

Rog

| --- | --- |

author: chasteauneuf

comments.content:
There are several "tape" fonts.  
I have not yet found an exact match.  
But here's [an explanation of how they are made](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016215701/http:/www.behance.net/gallery/The-Tape-Font/1979975), and [a free download at MyFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016215701/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/vlad-vlad/tape-font/).  
Don
Thanks so much Don, much appreciated - will have a look through...

You're welcome.  
Your image could be a font or a one-off artwork. To try to answer the question it's possible to dig further with search terms like "duct tape", "packing tape", etc. Creative questioning can pop up interesting answers.  
Don
